Header: Second highest haul of heroin seized from Beruwala
Content: A major heroin haul of 231 kilogrammes with a market value of 2778 million rupees has been seized by the Police. The Police Media Spokesman SP Ruwan Gunasekara said that two suspects were arrested along with the heroin haul. Police Spokesman SP Ruwan Gunasekara said officers of Police Narcotics Bureau arrested the two suspects with 231.54 kilograms of heroin from Beruwela â€“ Balapitiya beach area. Along with the suspects, the PNB has also seized a boat used to transport the drugs. The massive heroin haul is valued at 2,778 million rupees. He said that the Police Special Task Force and the Navy assisted in the raid.
